name: Goat Platformer
description:
This is a prototype platformer to test out the new Unity Input System. Run, jump, bounce on heads, and charge into barrels to break them!

Windows: w,s,a,d movement. Up arrow or Space to jump. CTRL to charge

Android: Three types of touch controls

1. Default - touch control areas on left and right. Left side - swipe left/right to move. Right side - swipe up to jump. Press and hold to charge

2. On-screen controls with arrow buttons, and a jump and charge buttons

3. On-screen controls with an analog stick and jump and charge buttons
